thig6.3:1.2: I am also a young lad.
thig6.3:1.3: Come, Khemā, let’s have a good time
thig6.3:2.4: I have uprooted craving for sensual pleasures.
thig6.3:3.1: Sensual pleasures are like the handle of an axe,
thig6.3:3.2: and one’s khandhas the executioner’s block.
thig6.3:3.3: The sensual pleasures that you call appealing
thig6.3:4.1: In this way all fixation is annihilated,
thig6.3:5.1: I used to pay homage to constellations,
thig6.3:5.4: I was a fool with a misconception of purity.
thig6.3:6.1: But now I pay homage to the Buddha,
thig6.3:6.4: I follow the teaching of the Teacher.”
